'''Loach Pearls''' are items obtained from Loaches. Currently, the Loach Pearl has no usage.

==How to Obtain==
The pearls are obtained from [[Loaches]]. They can be found in [[Bishui Plain]], notably around [[Dihua Marsh]] and [[Stone Gate]]. They can also be found on [[Watatsumi Island]].

See the '''[https://webstatic-sea.mihoyo.com/app/ys-map-sea/index.html#/map/2?shown_types=292,304,300 Teyvat Interactive Map]''' for specific locations.

==Trivia==
* While the in-game title and description uses the name "loach" for the animal, its design resembles that of an {{w|axolotl}}.
* The following birthday mails included Loach Pearl:
** [[Birthday/Diona#Help Me, Meow...|Diona's 2021 Birthday Mail]] (10 Loach Pearls)
* [[Yelan]] claims that Loach Pearls can be used as soundproof earplugs if ground down correctly.
